artist: Artist: Shen Maode (alias Geqing), active early 19th century
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: 3 large black characters on gold ground, with 6 smaller black characters and 2 red seals at L; other text on back
text:
The characters read from right to left:

Hall of Salutary Humility
title: Hall plaque
